subject.topic: Jean Lafitte National Historical Park and Preserve (La." Chalmette Unit
Jean Lafitte National Historical Park and Preserve (La.)

mods.abstract: Scene of the Battle of New Orleans, Dec1814-Jan1815 Battle raged on lands of Ignace de Lino de Chalmette, Antoine Bienvenue, and Denis de la Ronde British camps on lands of Jacques de Villere and Pierre Lacoste; hospital on Jumonville de Villiers Jackson Defense Line on Edmond Macarty place.
